> CA spends less than half as much per student as New York

Is New York a baseline for efficient spending and "best-outcome-for-the-buck", so to speak?

Also, in California, a good portion of education spending goes towards retired teachers' pensions http://www.mercurynews.com/news/ci_28061244/how-does-an-educ... so seems calculating the "per-student" spending should involve subtracting those fixed obligations.
